## jx get config

Display the project configuration

### Synopsis

Display the project configuration

```
jx get config [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # View the project configuration
  jx get config
```

### Options

```
  -d, --dir string   The root project directory
  -h, --help         help for config
```
